NaisTrainingDiary [Spanish Version]

Conversations in Spanish of the +18 visual novel Nais Training Diary

What does this version have?

This version includes an improved setup installer for easy management and uninstallation. Character dialogues are now available in Spanish, enhancing the experience for Spanish-speaking players.

How can I switch to Spanish?

You can select Spanish language from the setup options when starting the game for the first time.

Note: Spanish language applies only to character dialogues, not the game menu.

Is the game safe?

We ensure the game installer and language files are safe. No modifications have been made to the base game.

Important

Currently, only 16.01% of the game's dialogues are translated into Spanish. Contributions to improve the translation are welcome on our GitHub repository.
